feed.title: Password Pusher Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.57.1: Minor QR Code UI Fixes; Better Form Errors
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Fix UI for QR Code pushes (#3456) @ozovalihasan

:rocket: Features

  • Add an initializer to customize inputs having errors (#3459) @ozovalihasan

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump google-apis-storage_v1 from 0.52.0 to 0.53.0 (#3462) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-kms from 1.104.0 to 1.105.0 (#3457) @dependabot[bot]

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot[bot], @ozovalihasan, @pglombardo and dependabot[bot]

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.57.1

..and go to http://localhost:5100

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.58.0: New Secure Cookies Option
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

This releases adds new setting secure_cookies. Enable with PWP__SECURE_COOKIES=true or setting secure_cookies: true in your settings.yml.

Enabling this security feature will put in place a few security restrictions including:

  1. Only send cookies over HTTPS
  2. Prevent Javascript from accessing cookies
  3. Cookies can only be accessed in same-site requests

You can read more about the strategies employed here and the attack vectors it defends against here: https://guides.rubyonrails.org/security.html#sessions

Note that this option is disabled by default as enabling it will break those running over HTTP, on intranets and possibly those running behind some proxies.

:rocket: Features

  • Add a setting to use secure cookies (#3453) @ozovalihasan

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • Update the version of the mission_control-jobs gem (#3461) @ozovalihasan
  • :arrow_up: Bump rqrcode from 2.2.0 to 3.1.0 (#3306) @dependabot[bot]

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot[bot], @ozovalihasan, @pglombardo and dependabot[bot]

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.58.0

..and go to http://localhost:5100

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.58.2: New Purge Setting & MariaDB/MySQL Fix
entry.content:
This PR introduces a new setting purge_after (env var PWP__PURGE_AFTER):

Set the time after which expired pushes, including metadata like expiration settings and audit logs, are permanently deleted. Adjust this to control how long metadata is retained for enhanced privacy. Warning: Once purged, this data is irretrievable.

MySQL & MariaDB Fix

An issue was found (#3458) for MySQL & MariaDB users related to the recent data migration. This release introduces the fix.

Summary:

  • If you have pre-existing data, run v1.56.3 for a about an hour to allow the data migration job to complete. Afterwards, upgrade to this version (v1.58.2).
  • New installations: move directly to this release (v1.58.2) to fix the issue reported in #3458.

Note: This fix only applies to MySQL and MariaDB users.

:memo: What’s Changed

  • MySQL & MariaDB Fix: Defend against migration TypeError (#3502) @pglombardo
  • Fix the grey bar under the tab bar (#3497) @ozovalihasan

:rocket: Features

  • Add Option to Purge Expired Pushes After a Specified Duration (#3464) @ozovalihasan

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.226.1 to 3.226.2 (#3503) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump overcommit from 0.67.1 to 0.68.0 (#3500) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1122.0 to 1.1123.0 (#3499) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump sqlite3 from 2.7.0 to 2.7.1 (#3498) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump selenium-webdriver from 4.33.0 to 4.34.0 (#3496) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1121.0 to 1.1122.0 (#3495) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump jwt from 2.10.1 to 2.10.2 (#3494) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-kms from 1.105.0 to 1.106.0 (#3492) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1120.0 to 1.1121.0 (#3491) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.190.0 to 1.191.0 (#3489) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.226.0 to 3.226.1 (#3486) @dependabot[bot]
